text: The comonomer 1 was synthesized starting from 4,7-bis(8-bromonaphthalen-1-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadizole [26,29] through the Miyaura borylation reaction in a yield of 65%.
Methylation/ethylation of naphthalene-1,8-diol, followed by bromination with NBS in the presence of pyridine, afforded the target monomers 5 and 6 with a yield of 60% and 75%, respectively
